title: Braava jet™ Robot Mop Overview

asset.title: Braava jet™ Robot Mop Overview
asset.description:
Say 'hello' to the Braava jet™ mopping robot from iRobot and say 'goodbye' to everyday messes.

For more information on Braava jet, please visit http://bit.ly/1RLeEJh.
Subscribe to the iRobot YouTube channel http://bit.ly/1QcFGlb
Buy Now! http://bit.ly/BuyBraavajet
asset.author: iRobot

transcripts: Say hello to the Braava Jet mopping robot for iRobot and say goodbye to everyday messes. Just press clean Braava Jet automatically knows what to do. The precision jet spray loosens dirt while the vibrating cleaning head gently scrub stains, Braava Jet uses iRobots advanced navigation software and a full suite of sensors to map and track where it's been helping it mop in an efficient systematic cleaning pattern it keeps going until the whole room is clean. Braava Jet is great for kitchens and bathrooms, it's small enough to work its way into tight spots it carefully cleans around obstacles so it won't harm furniture rugs or walls when it's done simply eject the pad your hands never touch the dirt. Braava Jet features three cleaning modes it recognizes the type of cleaning pad and automatically adjusts the way it cleans. Attach a wet mopping pad and Braava Jet uses a triple task cleaning motion, precision jet spray and water activated cleaning agent to tackle dirt and stains. Attach a damp sweeping pad and Braava Jet uses a double touch cleaning motion, reduced spray and water activated cleaning agent to gently clean everyday dust and dirt. With a dry sleeping pad Braava Jet traps the locks, dust, dirt and pet hair using a single pass cleaning motion. Braava Jet is great for hard floors like hardwood tile and stone so you can enjoy cleaner floors and a fresher home everyday. You Braava Jet and IRobot better together.
